ModMetaData.name: Grenades Expanded
ModMetaData.author: Trunken
ModMetaData.description: This mod expands your arsenal on grenades for each tech stadium: - Holy Hand Grenade (Medieval Runthroughs, Exotic Traders) - Inferno Grenade (Medieval, Smithing) - Thermal Detonator (Advanced Fabrication, Space) - Dynamite (TNT, Industrial) - Stick Grenade (Nitro, Industrial) - Firecracker (Hightech Explosives, Space) Instructions: Aim at foes. Count to 3 before throwing. Don't drop it. Boom! Credits Assemblies NoCameraShake * by BadDog
